column4: Ubuntu 10.04LTS: Is there a way to write a script that copies *new* files from one folder into another folder?

is there a way to have rsync constantly running? I want to back up files from one hard drive to another, but only if they're added from this point on. I also want to be able to modify the files on one of the drives, so RAID isn't for me.
cron a job to run every 10 mins or so, I believe dropbox does LAN sync too, worth looking into
